@graphorlock
There are 13 episodes for season 1, 19 episodes for season 2, 22 episodes for season 3, 18 episodes for season 4, and 4 movies (4 parts each-16 total episodes) for season 5. You can get the list from wikipedia. This will also help you determine what episodes you might be missing. Happy torrenting to you!

V10? Are you serious? It has some serious flaws:
1. Wrong aspect ratio. (5:4 instead of 4:3)
2. Some scenes are blurred.
3. Lots of compression artifacts in faster scenes. (obviously a 1-pass encode)
